comment: Bo is the goat. If available for any class definitely take him! He makes his grading system where he prioritizes you learning the material rather than worrying about the grade. In thermo he only requires a 69 in the class to get a B.

He made it really easy to get an A in the class. He double curves all his tests. He also gives almost an exact practice test for every one. The final is a project which is graded by the other students, who usually give everyone a 100%. It is a really easy A. Highly recommend, but you might not learn a lot from him. You will need outside help.

Going into this MATLab class, I was scared since I'm really new to coding but this professor changed that. He explained everything well and gave loads of help when needed. It was an easy A of a class with him, but you should go to every lecture if you really want to secure that A.
